revision.comment: Notification of altered sources needing review #IABot (v1.2.4)
revision.text: {{WP Australia|military=yes|class=B|importance=Low|military-importance=mid}} {{WPMILHIST |class=Start |B-Class-1= yes |B-Class-2= yes |B-Class-3= yes |B-Class-4= yes |B-Class-5= yes |Australian-task-force=yes }} == location change == anyone got a problem with changing the location from darwin to RAAF Edinburgh adelaide —Preceding [[Wikipedia:Signatures|unsigned]] comment added by [[Special:Contributions/139.168.219.95|139.168.219.95]] ([[User talk:139.168.219.95|talk]]) 10:24, 27 February 2011 (UTC) :That should be fine. I've expanded the article a little bit to include historical information, but more information is needed about the brigade's activities from 1948 onwards. If anyone can help with that, and provide further references to reliable sources, that would be most appreciated. Cheers, [[User:AustralianRupert|AustralianRupert]] ([[User talk:AustralianRupert|talk]]) 22:42, 25 April 2011 (UTC) == Dead link == During several automated bot runs the following external link was found to be unavailable. Please check if the link is in fact down and fix or remove it in that case! * http://www.diggerhistory.info/pages-army-today/brigades/01bde.htm ** In [[1st Brigade (Australia)]] on 2011-05-25 06:51:45, Socket Error: 'getaddrinfo failed' ** In [[1st Brigade (Australia)]] on 2011-06-10 03:31:37, Socket Error: 'getaddrinfo failed' --[[User:JeffGBot|JeffGBot]] ([[User talk:JeffGBot|talk]]) 03:32, 10 June 2011 (UTC) == Dead link 2 == During several automated bot runs the following external link was found to be unavailable. Please check if the link is in fact down and fix or remove it in that case! * http://www.ordersofbattle.com/UnitData.aspx?UniX=6223&Tab=Sub&Titl=1%20Australian%20Infantry%20Brigade ** In [[1st Brigade (Australia)]] on 2011-06-10 03:34:17, 404 Not Found ** In [[1st Brigade (Australia)]] on 2011-06-25 13:16:18, Socket Error: 'A connection attempt failed because the connected party did not properly respond after a period of time, or established connection failed because connected host has failed to respond' --[[User:JeffGBot|JeffGBot]] ([[User talk:JeffGBot|talk]]) 13:16, 25 June 2011 (UTC) == Dead link 3 == During several automated bot runs the following external link was found to be unavailable. Please check if the link is in fact down and fix or remove it in that case! * http://www.ordersofbattle.com/UnitData.aspx?UniX=6223&Tab=Sup&Titl=1%20Australian%20Infantry%20Brigade ** In [[1st Brigade (Australia)]] on 2011-06-10 03:35:01, 404 Not Found ** In [[1st Brigade (Australia)]] on 2011-06-25 13:16:19, Socket Error: 'A connection attempt failed because the connected party did not properly respond after a period of time, or established connection failed because connected host has failed to respond' --[[User:JeffGBot|JeffGBot]] ([[User talk:JeffGBot|talk]]) 13:16, 25 June 2011 (UTC) == Dead link 4 == During several automated bot runs the following external link was found to be unavailable. Please check if the link is in fact down and fix or remove it in that case! * http://www.ordersofbattle.com/UnitData.aspx?UniX=6223&Tab=App&Titl=1%20Australian%20Infantry%20Brigade ** In [[1st Brigade (Australia)]] on 2011-06-10 03:35:01, 404 Not Found ** In [[1st Brigade (Australia)]] on 2011-06-25 13:16:41, Socket Error: 'A connection attempt failed because the connected party did not properly respond after a period of time, or established connection failed because connected host has failed to respond' --[[User:JeffGBot|JeffGBot]] ([[User talk:JeffGBot|talk]]) 13:17, 25 June 2011 (UTC) == Update to Standard Infantry Battalions == Reference for current configuration is out of date. [[User:AJAussie|AJAussie]] ([[User talk:AJAussie|talk]]) 05:17, 17 March 2015 (UTC) :Army.gov.au showing outdated the same outdated info. I'll leave it for now. [[User:AJAussie|AJAussie]] ([[User talk:AJAussie|talk]]) 05:23, 17 March 2015 (UTC) == External links modified == Hello fellow Wikipedians, I have just added archive links to {{plural:1|one external link|1 external links}} on [[1st Brigade (Australia)]]. Please take a moment to review [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?diff=prev&oldid=707560203 my edit]. If necessary, add {{tlx|cbignore}} after the link to keep me from modifying it. Alternatively, you can add {{tlx|nobots|deny{{=}}InternetArchiveBot}} to keep me off the page altogether. I made the following changes: *Added archive https://web.archive.org/20110402081329/http://www.army.gov.au/1BDE_ADEL/ to http://www.army.gov.au/1BDE_ADEL/ When you have finished reviewing my changes, please set the ''checked'' parameter below to '''true''' or '''failed''' to let others know (documentation at {{tlx|Sourcecheck}}). {{sourcecheck|checked=true}} Cheers.—[[User:Cyberbot II|cyberbot II]][[User talk:Cyberbot II|Talk to my owner]]:Online 15:37, 29 February 2016 (UTC) == External links modified == Hello fellow Wikipedians, I have just modified {{plural:1|one external link|1 external links}} on [[1st Brigade (Australia)]]. Please take a moment to review [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?diff=prev&oldid=739794717 my edit]. If you have any questions, or need the bot to ignore the links, or the page altogether, please visit [[User:Cyberpower678/FaQs#InternetArchiveBot|this simple FaQ]] for additional information. I made the following changes: *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20110608115748/http://www.army.gov.au/hq1bde/ to http://www.army.gov.au/hq1bde/ When you have finished reviewing my changes, please set the ''checked'' parameter below to '''true''' or '''failed''' to let others know (documentation at {{tlx|Sourcecheck}}). {{sourcecheck|checked=false}} Cheers.—[[User:InternetArchiveBot|'''InternetArchiveBot''']] ([[User talk:InternetArchiveBot|Report bug]]) 01:56, 17 September 2016 (UTC)
